entry.title: First post with Pelican
entry.content: This is just a test. Move along. :)

entry.title: Offensive Security OSCE Resources
entry.content:
This is a place for me to keep OSCE resources. I'll update as I see fit.

CTP Syllabus https://www.offensive-security.com/documentation/cracking-the-perimeter-syllabus.pdf

CTP Registration Challenge http://www.fc4.me/

Exploit Tutorials http://www.thegreycorner.com/search/label/tutorial http://www.fuzzysecurity.com/tutorials.html https://www.corelan.be/index.php/category/security/exploit-writing-tutorials/

Exploit Development https://github.com/stephenbradshaw/vulnserver

Registers https://www.swansontec.com/sregisters.html https://wiki.skullsecurity.org/Registers

CTP/OSCE Reviews and Guides https://www.securitysift.com/offsec-ctp-osce/ https://blog.g0tmi1k.com/2013/08/cracking-perimeter-ctp-offensive/ https://www.nearsecurity.com/2018/11/my-journey-into-offsec-abyss-oscp-and.html https://www.abatchy.com/2017/03/osce-study-plan https://rootkits.xyz/blog/2017/02/osce-ctp-offensive-security/ http://lmgtfy.com/?q=offsec+osce+exam+guide
